channel.title: A suggestion
channel.description:
No, im not spamming the website because i dont use it much. Im saying the for the good of the community.
[size=20pt]Demote ruler[/size]
My reasons:
1. He acts like a little girl and whines over nothing 2. He brings random shit to the forum when it has nothing to do with us. 3. He is a friggen idiot, i mean who posts an image in the community member section, about a add?
Otherwise, as this is an insufficient ammount of reasons, remove his privellage of seeing this board. All he has done if make random gay topics. I thought this board was here essentialy to protect the upper community from "n00bz"or maybe the administrator who created this board got it wrong. And if you want to be a smartass and say that ruler has been here longer than me, fine demote me too i dont give a shit. Also he may not be a n00b but he obviously doesnt have a life.
Oh try not to cry whilst reading this ruler.

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“marluxia, post:25, topic:221859”]

done[/quote]
In all likelihood that will not be permanent. Ruler was de-community membered as he continued to leak information from this section after explicit requests to cease and desist all passing of internal information (‘internal information’ can be defined as anything hidden from public view - I’m obviously not referring to staff discussion) to external parties.

No, he wasn’t de-CM’d because one or two of you dislike him and the rest of you decided to jump aboard the anti-ruler bandwagon.

item.title: A suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Does anyone else just enjoy reading Semaphore’s post?

Buttt, only thing I found wrong with your post Semaphore was that when you finished with the line: “you add humor to this forum”. He doesn’t add humor, he adds frustration and annoyance to people who have to put up with him. I just don’t understand how he hasn’t been banned for spamming or trolling.

@ ruler:
You’ve revealed someone? Who have you revealed? Oh, and please save your time by saving you revealed me asking about running a web server on a 64-bit archetype. I even asked it here, so, save your breath. Oh, and, the youtube account you found of mine which goes by the name of ‘Yz85Racer’? Whilst you’re at it, ruler, why not find my motocross.com account, my xBox live account, my hotmail account, my mxchat account. I’ll save you the time, they all go by the same name of ‘Yz85Racer’. However that may be a little hard for your course-failing brain to comprehend.

Read full topic

item.title: A suggestion
item.dc:creator: @semaphore semaphore
item.description:
@semaphore wrote:

If your parents never had children, chances are you won’t either.

See? I can quote random, stupid things too…

Fine. You and Genodemon are two different people. I seriously lost interest about three seconds after I clicked the ‘Post’ button on the thread. I’m flattered that you think so much about me that you keep a tally of things I say. Really, thanks. I wish I could say that I remember much of what we’ve argued about… I only remember that we have argued… and even that means very little to me.

I really cannot believe you actually mentioned rep.

I’m curious, when you say you’ve revealed people, do you think that you’ve somehow revealed me? Seriously? Is that your game? Well, I guess if you can’t code, you reveal.

Have you ever imagined that the only reason you are abused is because most see right through your hubris and delusions? I mean, who really cares about some soap opera quality gossip about joe forum user and bob forum user somehow sharing a tunnel. Get a clue? Are there high visibility people that are actually the same person? I know of a couple for certain. The thing is, who cares? One of the reasons I don’t visit facebook or myspace is because if gossip is what you want… go there… now.

As for your retarded brother being in cheating scenes… I’ve never seen him. I’ve been in some fairly exclusive cheating circles for some huge games and I know for a fact you wouldn’t last after your first post. Valhalla Legends stands out in my mind… You think you’re mocked here… those guys would crucify you for the crap that seems to be your bread and butter.

ruler, I seriously have nothing against you until you make stupid assumptions and accusations. You’ve probably been misinterpreted, misquoted, misunderstood, and mistaken on quite a few things. I don’t hold grudges. I just don’t care enough to.

One thing is certain, you add humor to this forum… albeit unintentionally.

Read full topic

item.title: A suggestion
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“semaphore, post:9, topic:221859”]I disagree. I happen to think that ruler shouldn’t be demoted. Even though he is hopelessly stupid or ignorant on many things he provides a chuckle or snicker every so often.

My most recent enjoyable rulerism was the 500gb hard disk to mail to and fro. I wonder if anyone else had red flags going up about personal information (address, etc) violations there…

Aside from that, I doubt he is even ruler anymore. I think he is just genodemon using his brother’s account. The gross inability to form a coherent sentence from time to time gives him away in all his genetically challenged splendor.

I think the real ruler has left us long ago and his younger or older (doesn’t matter) brother has taken over his account and in a classic display of Freudian defense mechanisms, has projected upon the community his delusion that somehow psb and semaphore are the same person. Isn’t it ironic? genodemon is probably ruler yet he leads the crusade against me and psb.[/quote]

[quote=“ruler, post:12, topic:163991”]update and some additions
according to a gmod here:
Semaphore and pplsuqballz have used the same ip.

Semaphore’s irc explanations:
Semaphore and pplsuqballz share a “http tunnel”
Posting timing be similara re due to both of them being on msn and talking.
pplsuqballz shares passwords with people.[/quote]

me and genodemon and different people. I don’t spend alot of timing writing high quality posts. I basically talk in a stream of consciousness.

Anyways i had 175 rep at kaitnieks. I have revealed alot of people and made alot of enemies. I don’t have many friends but those i do have are of the highest quality. I have made a good chunk of post and topics in the cm.

My Brother genodemon has been in cheating longer then most of you and probably will still be here long after your gone.

He may be right the site is going toward more of a social forum. I see people from my site joing here and wanting to learn and since they are not part of the social fabric here they are treated like outsiders and abused.

Read full topic

item.title: A suggestion
item.dc:creator: @semaphore semaphore
item.description:
@semaphore wrote:

I disagree. I happen to think that ruler shouldn’t be demoted. Even though he is hopelessly stupid or ignorant on many things he provides a chuckle or snicker every so often.

My most recent enjoyable rulerism was the 500gb hard disk to mail to and fro. I wonder if anyone else had red flags going up about personal information (address, etc) violations there…

Aside from that, I doubt he is even ruler anymore. I think he is just genodemon using his brother’s account. The gross inability to form a coherent sentence from time to time gives him away in all his genetically challenged splendor.

I think the real ruler has left us long ago and his younger or older (doesn’t matter) brother has taken over his account and in a classic display of Freudian defense mechanisms, has projected upon the community his delusion that somehow psb and semaphore are the same person. Isn’t it ironic? genodemon is probably ruler yet he leads the crusade against me and psb.

Read full topic

item.title: A suggestion
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Uriko:

err although i respect the fact that he earned his rep legibly, all he’s been doing lately is spamming this forum, and provokes flaming.

I have to agree. From my point of view (That being the view of a dude who has stood back from the “Ruler is a dumbass” bandwagon, be it a bandwagon or fact) he is degrading the community. I know many community members, including me, that have never given a contribution to our community, but most of us are nice people.

Then there is ruler who not only does not contribute to our community but a high percentage of his posts recently is stuff that no one here cares about and acts as kindling for flame wars to begin.

Also we all know that #mopar and www.moparisthebest.com are very different places. Therefore if someone from #mopar irc is attacking another community/website (Rulers or w/e) then don’t fucking post it on www.moparisthebest.com , discuss it in #mopar.

Read full topic
